org.spongepowered.api.registry

Interface RegistryModule

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AdditionalCatalogRegistryModule<T>, AlternateCatalogRegistryModule<T>, CatalogRegistryModule<T>, CraftingRecipeRegistry, ExtraClassCatalogRegistryModule<T,TExtra>, FactoryRegistry<T,TFactoryOwner>, RecipeRegistry<T>, SmeltingRecipeRegistry

    public interface RegistryModule
    A module that handles registrations of Objects, usually CatalogTypes. The use of this is to manage like-object registrations in a centralized manner, without requiring hard ids or content affecting behavior. All modules are to be loaded and registered with the GameRegistry.

    Note that there are various aspects of how initialization of these modules can be affected, be it from CatalogRegistryModules, DelayedRegistration, AlternateCatalogRegistryModules, or RegistrationDependency.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void registerDefaults()
      Performs default registrations of objects for use with either companion objects, or the GameRegistry.

    • Method Detail

      • registerDefaults

        default void registerDefaults()
        Performs default registrations of objects for use with either companion objects, or the GameRegistry. This is only called once, either at the pre-initialization phase of the GameRegistry, or if annotated with DelayedRegistration, at a later RegistrationPhase.
